Research has shown that sitting down for prolonged periods of time compromises metabolic health. This means organ damage, muscle degeneration, leg disorders, and a general misalignment of back especially when sitting improperly.

Stand Up helps you stay healthy by reminding you to stand up periodically when you plan on sitting down for prolonged periods of time. Start a session before sitting down and customize the timer settings for standing and sitting.

I hope this app is useful to you! You're more than welcome to forward your questions/comments/feedback to:
